name: Mettle
description:
Various combatants invade the peaceful forest in which you reside. You usually use your axe to chop down trees, but now its used to protect your home. Hunt down all who would trespass to once more live peacefully in solitude. 

Controls:

Player Movement - WASD

Camera Movement - Mouse

Attack - LMB

Dodge - Q

Axe Throw - Space
